title: Creating an interactive Typing Game Using jquery
content: This is a simple typing game experimental using jquery. The main criteria here is to understand how to read Keyboard Character Codes and displaying its equivalent Character on to the screen. You may notice so many bugs in the live demo because this program is not implemented fully as we concentra

title: PUBG Mobile Club Open 2019 announced with whopping Rs. 14 crore prize money: Here's how you can enter
content:
The Club Open event is a year-long event which has both pro and semi-pro teams which will then fight for the $2 million prize pool which is roughly Rs. 14 crores, the biggest in any PUBG Mobile event till date.
PUBG Mobile new Challenge gets Rs. 14 crore prize money PUBG Mobile
